column4: does the display in usage: vncviewer [<options>]  <host>:<display#> refer to the output monitor?
does the display in usage: vncviewer [<options>]  <host>:<display#> refer to the output monitor?
its the 'vncserver display #' not the monitor. vnc dosent need to be visubually showing anything on the physycal monitor
you can hafe a dozen+ vncservers going with different display #'1
